description.en: Exenpay is a crypto payment app where users can spend their crypto assets within Turkey and get cashback through each transaction through campaigns. Established in 2020 is a new generation digital wallet that develops services and products for user demands. ExenPay offers a unique and privileged user experience, provides ease of payment and offers deals and special offers through its partner businesses while developing new generation payment systems and aiming for the best in the financial technology sector.
